hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #village well# leads to the #Fishing Pond#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #2# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path of time.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 3 Top

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Deku Shield# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

HF (Cow Grotto).text: You're comparing yourself to me?^Ha! You're not even good enough to be my fake.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Ganon's Castle Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Visible Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Card# can be found in #Goron City#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #2 Deku Scrubs#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Bomb Bag# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #5# major items.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Gerudo Training Ground final reward# contains #Arrows (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Ice Arrows Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: It would be a shame if something... unfortunate... were to happen to you.^Have you considered saving lately?

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Maze Path First Chest

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest
